headline: Citi adds Qorvo and Skyworks Solutions to 90-day upside catalyst watch
summary: Investing.com -- Citi analysts have placed Qorvo (NASDAQ:QRVO) and Skyworks Solutions (NASDAQ:SWKS), Inc. on an "upside 90-day catalyst watch," anticipating better-than-expected June and September quarter results for the Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) suppliers.

content.title: Citi adds Qorvo and Skyworks Solutions to 90-day upside catalyst watch
content.summary: Investing.com -- Citi analysts have placed Qorvo (NASDAQ:QRVO) and Skyworks Solutions (NASDAQ:SWKS), Inc. on an "upside 90-day catalyst watch," anticipating better-than-expected June and September quarter results for the Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) suppliers.
